snippet: Voters in Florida and Montana sent a message to politicians who might want to attack women’s reproductive rights.
abstract: Editorial applauds Florida voters for rejecting amendment to State Constitution that would prohibit abortion coverage as part of state workers' health care plans and Medicaid recipients; maintains even while Montana voters approved parental notification mandate for abortion for minors, passage does not mean voters support broader government interference with women's reproductive choices.
lead_paragraph: Voters in Florida and Montana sent a message to politicians who might want to attack women’s reproductive rights.
